name: 99-nights-repo-config
description: Forked / spun: Custom Roblox executor build configuration for the 99-Nights project
author: josecmanxd

scripts.init: rokit install && pnpm install -w && pnpm run analyze:prepare
scripts.check: pnpm exec biome lint . --no-errors-on-unmatched && pnpm exec cspell . --quiet --dot --unique --gitignore && stylua -c . --respect-ignores && pnpm run analyze && pnpm run analyze:clean
scripts.analyze: pnpm run analyze:prepare && llsp analyze --defs=roblox.d.luau --no-strict-dm-types packages
scripts.analyze:clean: pnpm exec shx test -f roblox.d.luau && pnpm exec shx rm -rf roblox.d.luau
scripts.analyze:prepare: pnpm exec shx test -f roblox.d.luau || curl -o roblox.d.luau https://raw.githubusercontent.com/JohnnyMorganz/luau-lsp/main/scripts/globalTypes.d.luau
